research_notes: Comprehensive web search conducted for top 20 priority contacts focusing on October-November 2025 activity and working backwards through 2024-2025. All signals verified through public sources.

new_signals: Named Acting Director of Defense Innovation Unit (DIU) - August 2025, following Doug Beck's resignation
Confirmed as Pentagon CTO and Undersecretary of Defense for R&E - May 2025 (Senate vote 54-43)
Announced plan to trim DoD's Critical Technology Areas list from 14 categories - August 27, 2025, with announcements expected October-November 2025
Given 120-day deadline to present path forward for Advana and Maven AI platforms - signaling increased AI oversight authority
Emphasized DIU will remain independent organization despite his temporary oversight
updates.adjustment_reasoning: Dual role as Pentagon CTO and Acting DIU Director significantly increases influence over quantum-AI convergence at DoD. Authority over critical technology prioritization and AI platform decisions makes him the single most important defense technology decision-maker. Maximum priority justified.
updates.outreach_timing: Immediate - October/November 2025 timeframe is critical as he finalizes CTA announcements

new_signals: Launched Ironwood TPU (7th generation) at Google Cloud Next '25 - April 2025: 42.5 exaflops at 9,216 chips, 5x more compute than prior gen
Predicted '2025 will be transition year where generative AI shifts from answering single questions to solving complex problems through agentic systems'
Announced 50+ partners including Salesforce, ServiceNow, SAP supporting Agent Development Kit (ADK) and Agent2Agent (A2A) protocols
Ironwood delivers 30x more power efficiency than Google's first Cloud TPU from 2018
Emphasized networking remains #1 bottleneck for AI scaling, aligning with March 2025 Optica statement
updates.adjustment_reasoning: Ironwood launch and agentic AI ecosystem represent Google's most significant AI infrastructure moves of 2025. His networking bottleneck thesis is now proven at 9,216-chip scale. Agentic AI focus creates perfect timing for quantum coordination conversation. Elevated to maximum priority.
updates.outreach_timing: Immediate - Post-Cloud Next '25 momentum, agentic AI architecture discussions active

new_signals: Raised $1 billion Series E funding - September 2025, led by BlackRock with NVIDIA's NVentures participating, $7B valuation
Broke ground on Chicago quantum computing facility - October 2025, described by O'Brien as 'largest quantum computing project in America'
Announced NVIDIA collaboration across quantum algorithms, GPU-QPU integration, and silicon photonics platform
Integrated Barium Titanate (BTO) into manufacturing flow at GlobalFoundries Fab 8 - critical for optical switches
Quote: 'Only building the real thing—million-qubit scale, fault-tolerant machines—will unlock the promise of quantum computing'
updates.adjustment_reasoning: The $1B raise and NVIDIA partnership represent transformational validation of PsiQuantum's approach. Chicago groundbreaking in October 2025 means active construction phase requiring coordination infrastructure NOW. GPU-QPU integration speaks directly to InfraFabric's value proposition. Maximum priority.
updates.outreach_timing: Immediate - Construction phase requires infrastructure planning, NVIDIA integration underway

new_signals: OpenAI partnership announced - October 2025: OpenAI to deploy up to 6 gigawatts of AMD Instinct GPUs, potentially giving OpenAI 10% stake in AMD
Unveiled MI400 series with Helios complete rack-scale system approach - Mid-2025
Announced 2nm 'Venice' chips taped out on TSMC's 2nm node, shipping 2026 - first high-performance 2nm product in industry
Exceeded energy efficiency target: achieved 38X improvement vs 30X goal with MI350 series
Scheduled to deliver ISC 2025 opening keynote in June: 'HPC and AI: A Path Towards Sustainable Innovation'
updates.adjustment_reasoning: OpenAI partnership is game-changing for AMD's AI credibility and represents largest AI deployment commitment outside NVIDIA. Rack-scale Helios approach and energy efficiency leadership align perfectly with quantum-ready infrastructure messaging. Maximum priority warranted.
updates.outreach_timing: Immediate - OpenAI partnership in execution phase, rack-scale architecture decisions being made

AgentCore's 8-hour workload capability and 1M+ SDK downloads show market traction. October 2025 Quick Suite launch proves internal validation. Maximum priority - this is THE moment for quantum-AI coordination pitch.

new_signals: Published updated Quantum-Safe Program (QSP) roadmap - August 2025: quantum-safe capabilities in core products by 2029, default by early 2030s
Integrated PQC algorithms into SymCrypt library used by Windows, Azure, and Office 365
SymCrypt now supports ML-KEM (formerly Crystals-Kyber) and ML-DSA (formerly Crystals-Dilithium)
Outlined comprehensive PQC integration across Windows, Azure services, Microsoft 365, data platforms, AI services, and networking
Emphasized confidential computing with memory encryption as foundation for AI security
updates.adjustment_reasoning: August 2025 QSP roadmap update with 2029 timeline creates urgency. PQC integration into core Microsoft stack (SymCrypt across all platforms) represents massive enterprise commitment. AI services explicitly included in quantum-safe strategy. Strong increase justified - this is active implementation phase.
updates.outreach_timing: Immediate - 2029 deadline means architecture decisions happening now

new_signals: Keynoted 2025 Defense R&D Summit - January 23, 2025, warning about quantum computing threats
Stated 'over time, my optimism has diminished' about quantum computing timelines - 2025
Warned of 'black swan' quantum breakthrough that could 'wreck world economy'

updates.adjustment_reasoning: January 2025 keynote shows diminished quantum optimism and prediction of 'quantum winter'. His bullishness on AI over quantum suggests reduced quantum investment priority at NSA. Black swan warning maintains threat awareness but engineering pessimism may reduce near-term quantum spending. Decrease reflects tempered expectations.
updates.outreach_timing: Delayed - Wait for quantum sentiment to improve, focus on PQC defensive measures
